subject: Football
lead_paragraph: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Oct. 21 (AP) — Reggie Nelson was lying down next to his locker Friday, a shirt draped over his face as he took a short nap.
snippet: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Oct. 21 (AP) — Reggie Nelson was lying down next to his locker Friday, a shirt draped over his face as he took a short nap.
